full_summary:
**Local Access Service Nova Scotia and Prince Edward Island - Core**
**Service d'accès local Nouvelle-Écosse et l’Ile du Prince Edouard - Centre**

**Procurement Reference:** PW-22-01017086
**Référence procédure:** PW-22-01017086

**Publication Date:** 2022-12-13
**Date de publication:** 2022-12-13

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-27T14:00:00
**Date de clôture ouverture:** 2022-12-27T14:00:00

The Government of Canada intends to award a contract for the Local Access Service (LAS) to a pre-identified supplier in Nova Scotia and Prince Edward Island. The Service is currently provided using legacy copper-based services such as Centrex Service and basic business lines. The requirement is for a single supplier to provide the listed services.

**Services to be Provided:**
The successful supplier will be responsible for the provision of Local Access Services to the Government of Canada with offices located across parts of Nova Scotia and Prince Edward Island. The services will include installation, maintenance, and updating of infrastructure associated with delivering the service to ensure that the service consistently meets detailed service level requirements.

**Important Dates:**

* December 31, 2023: Contract Commencement Date
* 10 years: Contract Period

**Eligibility Requirements:**
Any interested supplier must demonstrate by way of a Statement of Capabilities that it can fulfill the following requirements as of the date of this notice:

* A minimum of 10 years of experience in delivering complex, feature-rich local access services to large-scale customers with multiple locations within the last 15 years
* At least 5 years of experience in delivering local access services within the last 10 years for the given geographic areas
* The supplier must have at least 5 years of experience in supporting at least 50% of the volume of total approximate local access lines across the applicable geographic region (this experience can be gained serving one or a combination of two customers)

**How to Express Interest:**
Suppliers who consider themselves fully qualified and available to provide the services described in this notice may submit a Statement of Capabilities in writing to the contact person identified below on or before the closing date of this notice.

**Contact Information:**
Jean-Charles St-Onge, Procurement Team Leader, Shared Services Canada, (613) 618-0167
